main event: A Technical Sergeant observed a mysterious object, cone-shaped and oscillating, near Langley Air Force Base, Virginia, on December 30, 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed from about 10,000 feet away, at an altitude of approximately 5,000 feet., The base of the object was 8 feet in diameter and 20 feet tall., Witnesses described the object as having a steady base while the top oscillated., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes., There were no photographs taken of the object.
witness description: Technical Sergeant and three other airmen from the Ninth Air Force Headquarters
